remarks: A basis element is in the orthocomplement of a subset of the basis iff it is not in the subset.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Oct-2015.)
statement:
obselocv.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` W ) $.
obselocv $p |- ( ( B e. ( OBasis ` W ) /\ C C_ B /\ A e. B ) -> ( A e. ( ._|_ ` C ) <-> -. A e. C ) ) $.
